metadata.synopsis: A group of adventurers reconvene after spreading around in Wyrm's Crossing to buy supplies. They are in a rush to leave for neverwinter before the absolute arrives. This is the Tiefling one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -16; 51; -52- Talk to the tiefling of the adventurer group.

0.speaker: Quinara
0.text: I ain't looking to make friends - or enemies. Go bother someone else.
0.context: NodeContext: trying to tell us to piss off as quietly and calmly as possible

1.speaker: Quinara
1.text: Off with you - I've bags to pack and blades to sharpen.
1.context: NodeContext: dismissing a stranger who has interrupted them
